apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts two men sharing a tender kiss, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading that gives them a warm, lifelike appearance. The man on the left, with no skin tone modifier, is depicted with a soft, neutral tone, while the man on the right, featuring a medium-light skin tone, exhibits subtle highlights and shadows that enhance the depth and realism of their embrace. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, beautifully conveys romantic affection and intimacy, often used to celebrate relationships or express deep fondness in digital conversations.
